column4: Can you guys just tell me how I could make it harder for people to do that 'PoD' thing on me ?

do you have root shell access to the server?  You need to start blocking all kinds of stuff.  One tool that will educate you (the hard way) is bastille.  It will break your system if you aren't careful though.  Bastille is for educational purposes only (not really ;-) )
